title: BRIEF-Layne Christensen Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.14 From Continuing Operations
text:
April 10, 2018 / 8:29 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Layne Christensen Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.14 From Continuing Operations Reuters Staff 
April 10 (Reuters) - Layne Christensen Co: 
* LAYNE CHRISTENSEN REPORTS FISCAL 2018 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.14 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS 
* BACKLOG WAS $47.9 MILLION AT JANUARY 31, 2018 COMPARED TO $63.4 MILLION AT OCTOBER 31, 2017 AND $49.2 MILLION AT JANUARY 31, 2017 
* QUARTERLY REVENUES $110.4 MILLION VERSUS $99.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
